```{r}
#| echo: false
add_card <- function(url, text, icon, img, color) {
  lines <- c(
    '<div class="g-col-12 g-col-md-6 g-col-xl-4">',
    paste0(
      '<a href="',
      url,
      '" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">',
      '<div class="card h-100" style="border: 4px solid ',
      color,
      '; background-color: ',
      colorspace::lighten(color, 0.7),
      '; transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s;"',
      ' onmouseover="this.style.transform=\'scale(1.05)\'; this.style.boxShadow=\'0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)\';"',
      ' onmouseout="this.style.transform=\'scale(1)\'; this.style.boxShadow=\'none\';">'
    ),
    paste0(
      '<img src="assets/img/header/',
      img,
      '" alt="',
      text,
      '" class="card-img-top" style="opacity: 0.8;">'
    ),
    '<div class="card-body" style="padding: 1rem 1rem 0rem 1rem;">',
    paste0(
      '<div class="btn d-inline-flex" style="background-color:',
      color,
      '; border:none;">',
      '<i class="bi bi-',
      icon,
      '" style="margin-right: 10px;"></i>',
      text,
      '</div>'
    ),
    '</div>',
    '</div>',
    '</a>',
    '</div>'
  )

  cat(lines, sep = "\n")
}
```
